Stanza 1:

Stanza 2: (notes similar to Stanza 1)
Cooum Aru kadalil sayrum antha idathil
Itha pAthu vitta uluva meenu vatchathaiya vaikungo

Cooum Aru kadalil sayrum antha idathil

Panchayathu thalaivarana sura meenu thAnungo
Panchayathu thalaivarana sura meenu thAnungo
avan sonna padi iruvarukum nitchaithartham thAnungo
Kalyanam nadanthu varuthu pArungo

Stanza 3: (notes similar to Stanza 1)
MApillai sontha pandham meesa kar erango
antha nethili podiya kAra podiya kalagalanu irukuthu

antha nethili podiya kAra podiya kalagalanu irukuthu

Penuku sontha bandham meesa kAra kaduma.....

Stanza 4: (notes similar to Stanza 1)
MApillai vazhai meenu pazhavar kAdu thAnungo
antha manna ponnu vilangu meenin meenjuru thAnungo

antha manna ponnu vilangu meenin meenjuru thAnungo

Intha thirumanatha nadathivaikum thirukamalu annango
